general_advisory: During the rainy season, conduct regular health checks on livestock. Ensure a clean and adequate water supply. Regularly check water sources for contamination and maintain proper hygiene.

advisory: Blister beetles feed on the flowers and reduce the number of pods setting, affect the yield. Manual collection and disposal recommended.
Possible presence of sucking pests like Aphids, Jassids, Thrips, and Whiteflies due to current weather conditions. Early stage infestation management with neem-based pesticide recommended.
Apply Emamectin benzoate or spinosad to control Fruit and Shoot borer.
To control Red Pumpkin Beetle, spray Cyantraniliprole, Imidacloprid, or Chlorpyriphos.
For Cauliflower, cabbage, and Broccoli nursery management, follow specific seed rates and nursery bed preparation instructions.
During rainy season, conduct regular health checks on livestock to identify signs of stress or illness early.
